Title: Six Month Leave
Plot: Freddy Rumsen disappoints his team during a pitch. Pete finds an opportunity at the office to exploit while Don proves his loyalty to an old friend. Betty finds a welcome distraction in Sara Beth.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Writer: Andre Jacquemetton, Maria Jacquemetton, Matthew Wein
GuestStars: Bryan Batt, Mark Moses, Joel Murray, Talia Balsam, Gabriel Mann, Patrick Fischler
